about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for Curious Expedition 2, featuring full length versions of the tracks in the game. Total length: 1 hour, 6 minutes.

Composed, produced, arranged and mixed by Alexander Batsch aka Selbstserum
Mastering by Linus Andersson
Cover art by Garen Ewing

Unlike its predecessor, the soundtrack is created with acoustic instruments exclusively to accompany the ligne claire graphic style of the game.

Instruments used: metallophone, sarangi, piano and prepared piano, electric and acoustic guitar, electric bass, kalimba, zither, accordion, melodica, harpsichord, organ, recorder, harmonica, treated music box, xylophone, glass harp, gopichand, dàn moi, jew’s harp, tingsha bells, elephant bell, sleigh bells, tubular bells, wind chimes, timpani, tbilat, dholak, hand drum, riq, tambourine, hi-hat, shaker, rainstick, vibraslap, flexatone, agogo, claves, thunder pipe, frog buzzer, castanets, bicycle rim, metal bowl, voice and tape machine.
